jobDescription: What you'll be doing Own compensation strategy, inclusive but not limited to maintaining minimum wage changes, aligning on decision on retail compensation, maintaining job families and level based compensation bandsDevelop, implement, and administer compensation policies and programsAssist with the annual compensation planning process, inclusive of data analysis, philosophy/strategy work and administrationLead compensation benchmarking and continuous improvement to ensure Philz remains competitively positionedPerform ad hoc analysis to support business needsPartner with payroll to ensure 100% accuracy in all compensation changesDevelop compensation communications for managers What you'll need to succeed 6+ years of experience in a compensation roleExperience with a high growth culture focused retail/food and beverageHighly collaborative style and strong team orientationEnergetic, self-starter with the ability to successfully manage multiplepriorities in a complex, fast-paced environment
